content.raw:
not what I mean. I am using import roslaunch module not the cli.

This is my code to run roslaunch:

uuid = roslaunch.rlutil.get_or_generate_uuid(None, False)
roslaunch.configure_logging(uuid)
launch = roslaunch.parent.ROSLaunchParent(uuid, ['/opt/ros/indigo/share/srcsim/launch/qual22.launch'])

There is no provision I could find to add arguments
